edge: Aamir Khan portrays the character of Akash Malhotra in the movie.
Saif Ali Khan acts as Sameer Mulchandani in the film.
Akshaye Khanna essays the role of Siddharth 'Sid' Sinha in the movie.
Preity Zinta depicts the character of Shalini in the film.
Sonali Kulkarni plays the role of Pooja in the movie.
Dimple Kapadia portrays Tara Jaiswal in the film.
Samantha Tremayne depicts the character of Deepa in the movie.
Ayub Khan acts as Rohit in the film.
Rajat Kapoor portrays Mahesh, Shalini's maternal uncle, in the movie.
Suchitra Pillai depicts Priya in the film.
Suhasini Mulay essays the role of Nandini Sinha, Sid's mother, in the movie.
Bomi Doctor portrays A. R. Mulchandani, Sameer's father, in the movie.
Anjula Bedi depicts Mrs. Mulchandani, Sameer's mother, in the movie.
Yusuf Hussain portrays Naresh, Pooja's father, in the film.
Ahmed Khan essays the role of A. K. Malhotra, Akash's father, in the movie.
Rajendranath Zutshi provides voice for Ajay, Tara's ex-husband, in the movie.
Rakesh Pandey portrays Balwant, Rohit's father, in the film.
